title: POLAR BEAR CLUB IN THE HURLEY STUDIOS: SCREAMS IN CAVES
description:
Our good friends Polar Bear Club dropped by the recording studio and tracked this awesome live version of Screams In Caves from their album Clash Battle Guilt Pride, out now on Bridge Nine records. The boys are currently wrapping up their US tour with Bad Religion (previous Hurley studios visitors).

Video: YB
